participant_1.background:
I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.
I am four years old.
I like to eat chocolate candy.
I like to look at blocks and sing about letters.
When i grow up i want to be a dog.

participant_2.background:
I live in a three storey house.
My family is continuously growing.
I enjoy long walks with my dog.
I am a professional tennis player.
I am married to a doctor.

content.text: Hi my name is participant_1 and I am 4 years old.
Hi participant_2, nice to meet you! I'm participant_2 and I'm 28 years old.
It's nice to meet you too! I like to play but people have a hard time understanding.
Oh, that's okay. I like to play too. What are some of your favorite things to play with?
I like to play with blocks and sing about letters. I also like to eat chocolate candy.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to play with my dog, go for walks, and play tennis.
I like dogs! I want to be a dog when I grow up.
That would be a lot of fun! I'm sure you would be a great dog.
Thank you! I think I would be a great dog too. I would be very friendly and I would love to play all the time.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you would be a very happy dog.
Thank you! I think I would be too.
So, what do you like to do for fun when you're not playing?
I like to watch TV and read books. I also like to go to the park with my parents.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to watch TV too, but I don't really read books. I like to go to the park with my dog, but I don't have any kids.
That's okay. I like to go to the park with my parents too.
So, what's your favorite TV show?
I like to watch Peppa Pig.
I've never heard of that show. What's it about?
It's about a pig family. Peppa Pig is the little sister and she's always getting into trouble.
Sounds like a fun show! I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's really funny.
Well, it sounds like you're having a great time. I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! I'm having a lot of fun.
Well, I'm glad I could meet you. It was nice chatting with you.
It was nice meeting you too! I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too!
